roles.title: Head of Technology
roles.description: Took Capital Brief from idea to working product in 6 months, including website, newsroom CMS, newsletter product and subscription platform.

roles.title: Security Practice Lead
roles.description: Accountable for raising security awareness and proficiency for 30+ engineering teams across Nine. Empowered engineers to adopt a DevSecOps mindset, through education, tooling and expertise.

roles.title: Engineering Manager
roles.description: Part of the Fairfax Media Blue Project, building what became an INMA award winning newsroom CMS. Managed a team of high performing, talented engineers. Strong focus on helping them reach the next step of their career goals.

roles.title: Head of IT & Development
roles.description: Responsible for sourcing and managing a small team of local and offshore engineers. Accountable for continuous product delivery, deploying stable and performant Cloud infrastructure, along with management of internal IT hardware and systems.

roles.title: Technology Manager
roles.description: Responsible for sourcing and managing a small team of designers and engineers, managing the continuing development of Allure web properties. Role spanned design, video production, web development, along with DevOps and Sysadmin duties. Lead the 2011 redesign of the Allure Media Technology Network.

roles.title: Web Designer & Developer
roles.description: Responsible for designing and developing websites and advertisements, creating Flash animations, along with directing video, animation and motion graphics work.

roles.title: Designer & Video Producer
roles.description: Self-employed. Providing photography, web services and short promotional videos.
